text: XPM may refer to: * Primecoin, a peer-to-peer open source cryptocurrency * X PixMap, an ASCII text image format used by the X Window System (uses the extension `.xpm`) * XPM (TV series), a Canadian sitcom television series * Extreme project management * Cross-phase modulation, a technique used in optical transmission and reception * Windows XP Mode, a virtualization feature available for Windows 7
title: XPM
